item.title: ‘New Years Rev’ Trailer: Green Day Fans Take a Rock ‘n’ Roll Road Trip in Coming-of-Age Comedy (EXCLUSIVE)
item.description: Three buddies take a cross-country road trip under the false belief their band is opening for Green Day in the coming-of-age comedy “New Years Rev,” premiering at Toronto Intl. Film Festiv
